content.text: Located on the 5th floor of Wellcome Collection, The Hub is a dedicated space in which residents can think creatively, collaborate openly and exchange ideas freely.
Though closed to the public, The Hub demonstrates Wellcomeâ€™s commitment to supporting interdisciplinary research, and brings this right to the heart of its dynamic museum, library and public space.
Keep your eyes peeled for upcoming events in Wellcome Collection led by the Hub residents as well as interventions and experiments in the Reading Room.
Discover more about the dynamic and flexible space.
